effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 670,837 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 260,165.
(4) Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,183 and Haste by 7,928.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 285,963, and Intellect by 7,261.
Use: Supercharge yourself and increase your Haste by 6,246 for 15 sec. The first ally you heal directly is also charged, increasing their Haste by 1,863 for 10 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Val'anyr, Hammer of Ancient Kings
